org.codeseed.common.config.ext

Class CommandLineOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codeseed.common.config.ext.CommandLineOptionsBuilder

  • public class CommandLineOptionsBuilder
extends Object
    A builder for Apache Commons CLI Option instances which uses annotations found on configuration interfaces.
    Author:
    Jeremy Gustie

      • addOption

        protected void addOption(org.apache.commons.cli.Options options,
                         Map<String,org.apache.commons.cli.OptionGroup> groups,
                         Method method)
        Potentially adds an option to the supplied collection. Used by the build() method to populate an options collection.
        Parameters:
        options - the current collection of options
        groups - mappings of argument group identifiers to groups
        method - the configuration method to look up
